text:
Our Safe Care Heroes at MCHS! 
No one tool alone is going to stop the #COVID19 pandemic.  A combination of getting a COVID-19 #vaccine, wearing a mask, staying at least 6 feet away from others, and washing your hands often are all needed. Learn more: https://t.co/hWcIhOfMWh https://t.co/bUSHEXsQOG
